short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A extension that automatically extracts email IDs from web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Powerful Extension to Automatically Extract Email IDs from Web Pages

Email Extractor Tool is a robust Chrome extension designed to automatically fetch valid email IDs from web pages. You can easily copy specific email addresses or export all of them to a text or CSV file.

How It Works:

Automation:Build a queue of up to 1,000 URLs that you want to visit. The tool will launch a robot that visits the requested pages and extracts all email addresses found on those webpages.

AutoSave: This feature stores all email IDs found on the pages you visit in the cloud.

The plugin fetches email IDs from the source code, which means it can find hidden email IDs that may not be visible on the front end. For example, if a website shows 3 email IDs, the plugin might fetch more if there are hidden email IDs in the source code.

Features:
AutoVisit: Build a queue of URLs to visit automatically.
Automation: Discover all email IDs ending with a specific domain name.
Automatic Email Extraction: Extract email addresses from web pages.
Download Option: Download stored email IDs.
Ajax Page Extraction: Extract emails from Ajax pages, such as Google Search.
Duplicate Filter: Filters duplicate email IDs to provide unique ones.
Export Options: Export extracted emails to a text file.

Important Notes:
Extracted IDs will be overwritten if you open a new tab and browse to a new page. To avoid this, switch to the previous tab to fetch and export the IDs. But every email address will be stored on cloud.

Informal Disclaimer: 
This extension is not intended for spamming people with marketing emails. Use it for personal purposes only.
